## Description

A Conway's Game of Life code. Part of Big Geodata Processing course

## Installation

To install Game-of-Life from GitHub repository, do:

```console
git clone https://github.com/Wenjie-Cheng/Game-of-Life.git
cd Game-of-Life
python -m pip install .
```
